BBEX3.A.LRD.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Liberia  / EUR 1 = LRD ... (middle)
Source: Central Bank of Liberia, Monrovia.

Methodology: From December 2000 to December 2005, the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of month-end middle rates, from January to November 2000 and from January 2006 calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates for the US dollar in Liberia in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bankfor the US dollar.
